section.title: Getting Started
section.para: The skillsOnCourse portal is a web site that gives you the information you need without having to contact the college regularly. "Is my class full?", "Will my class go ahead?", "Can I get a class roll". These are all things that the portal can help answer.

section.title: Recovering and Resetting Passwords
section.para: The main login screen for the skillsOnCourse portal includes a 'forgot password' link. You will need your name and email address in order to initiate the process. If you are not sure what these details are please contact the college so that they can manually update your record.

When you click on the forgot password link after you have entered your details, an email will be sent to you with a link to allow you to create a new password. This link will be valid for 24 hours only, after that time the link within your email will not work. Once you have reset your password, they can continue using skillsOnCourse.

para.programlisting:
Dear {name},
To reset your SkillsOnCourse password, simply click the link below. That will take you to a web page where you can create a new password. Please note that the link will expire 24 hours after this email was sent.
{recoveryLink}
If you weren't trying to reset your password, don't worry - your account is still secure and no one has been given access to it. Most likely, someone just mistyped their email address while trying to reset their own password.

section.title: Updating Your Details
section.para: Once logged in, you are able to update your contact details via the My Profile menu.
This screen also enables you to update your password.

imagedata.fileref: images/Tutor Portal My Profile Update Password.png

section.title: Class information
section.para: You are also able to access Class information, including total number of enrolments, venue and room information. This can be found by either clicking on the top menu option 'Timetable', then click on the name of the Class you want more information about this. Alternatively you can click on the class name under the 'Classes' column on the right side of the window.

imagedata.fileref: images/Tutor Portal Classes Menu Details Tab.png

caption.para: You can access detailed class information via the skillsOnCourse portal

section.title: Viewing and Marking a Class Roll
section.para: You can also access the attendance roll for classes you are teaching by clicking on the name of the class. The attendance records get updated in real time.

imagedata.fileref: images/Tutor Portal Classes Menu Marking Roll.png

caption.para: Live attendance tracking via the skillsonCourse portal

section.title: Approving Classes
section.para: You can confirm your availability for a given Class using the Portal. To access any Classes that you have not yet confirmed your availability for, simply click on the APPROVALS button at the top right hand side of the Portal. There is also a dialog box available for you to send in comments and/or suggested amendments to the course copy.

caption.para: You can confirm availability for a given Class via the Portal

section.title: Viewing Student Results
section.para: You have the ability to view a list of results for each unit of competency of your students; this can be found by clicking on the 'Results' option in the top menu. They will be marked either PASS, FAILED OR NO RESULT.

imagedata.fileref: images/Tutor Portal Classes Menu Results Tab.png

caption.para: Student Assessment Sorted by Unit of Competency

section.title: Class Resources and Files
section.para: You also have access to a list of resources and files for each individual class you teach. These can be found by clicking on the 'Resources' option in the top menu

imagedata.fileref: images/Tutor Portal Classes Menu Resources Tab.png

caption.para: Available teaching resources and documents for a Class
